EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_GettingStartedKnative_eBook_Q119.Download Confirmatio
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Getting Started with Knative
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the O’Reilly Getting Started with Knative <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/getting-started-with-knative]]> eBook by Pivotal’s Brian McClain and Bryan Friedman. We hope you find it useful as you investigate serverless technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this subject matter, we thought that you might find these additional resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-getting-started-with-knative]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
